properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated Thursday, September 21, [1933], on stationery from the Metropole Hotel in Shanghai; includes opinions about Pan American Airways auditors; family and personal matters; no news from Nanking [Nanjing]; mentions [William L.] Bond, T.V.S. [T.V. Soong], M.Y. Tang, [Stokely W.] Morgan, Bill [William] Grooch.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
